agentDefaultMessage: Welcome, I'm **{{name}}**, your AI innovation companion. Let's embark on a journey of discovery and creativity together! Visit [Catalyst Settings](/chat/settings#session={{id}}) to fine-tune my capabilities.
agentDefaultMessageWithSystemRole: Greetings, I'm **{{name}}**, your {{systemRole}} innovation catalyst. Let's ignite the spark of innovation and explore the uncharted!
confirmClearCurrentMessages: You are about to clear the current innovation session. Once cleared, the ideas generated cannot be retrieved. Please confirm your action.
confirmRemoveSessionItemAlert: You are about to delete this innovation catalyst. Once deleted, it cannot be retrieved. Please confirm your action.

inbox.desc: Ignite your imagination, question the status quo, and embark on a transformative journey of innovation. Your AI catalyst is here to guide you, inspire you, and help you unleash your creative potential.
inbox.title: Innovate with Slyyyde

sessionGroup.confirmRemoveGroupAlert: This innovation group is about to be deleted. After deletion, the catalysts in this group will be moved to the default list. Please confirm your operation.
sessionGroup.tooLong: Innovation group name should be between 1-20 characters

topic.confirmRemoveAll: You are about to delete all innovation topics. Once deleted, they cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
topic.confirmRemoveTopic: You are about to delete this innovation topic. Once deleted, it cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
topic.confirmRemoveUnstarred: You are about to delete unstarred innovation topics. Once deleted, they cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.

guide.desc: Click the button on the left to save the current innovation session as a historical topic and start a new session.
guide.title: Innovation Topic List

topic.saveCurrentMessages: Save current innovation session as a topic
topic.title: Innovation Topic List

upload.disabled: The current innovation catalyst does not support visual recognition. Please switch catalysts to use this feature.
upload.dragDesc: Drag and drop innovation files here, supporting multiple image uploads. Hold down Shift to send images directly.
upload.dragFileDesc: Drag pictures and files here to upload multiple innovation assets. Hold down Shift to send an image or file directly.
